name: universal-book-scraper
description: Configurable Chrome Extension for scraping book content to Markdown

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const p=path.join('node_modules','turndown','lib','turndown.browser.umd.js');const out=path.join('vendor','turndown.js');if(fs.existsSync(p)){fs.mkdirSync('vendor',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(p,out);console.log('Copied turndown.js to vendor/');}else{console.warn('Turndown not found at '+p);}"
